wikipedia_page.main: Paul Brian Nugent (born 4 April 1983 in Alexandria) is a Scottish former professional footballer, who played for Scottish Second Division club Dumbarton as well as East Fife, Stirling Albion and Clyde.

response: *Paul Nugent (Gaelic footballer), Gaelic footballer and selector
*Paul Nugent (Scottish footballer) (born 1983), Scottish footballer currently playing for Dumbarton
